ComicInfo.Title: A Sprig of Thaxin; A Dream of Milk and Honey; Ravens
ComicInfo.Summary:
The companion to Star*Reach goes magazine sized with early work from Michael T. Gilbert.
Editorial: Friedrich (1 page text article)
A Sprig of Thaxin: Kirchner (16 pages)
A Dream of Milk and Honey part 2: Gilbert (16 pages)
Ravens: Kimball, Gould (1 page)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 08:24:14. [CVDB19456] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 03:36:58. [Issue ID 33311]
